column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I have only written a couple of reviews ever
column2: but I am compelled to write a review for Common Bond because it was truly one of the best restaurants I have ever been to. If you are considering going...GO NOW! Everything at the bakery is perfection...from the bread
column3: to the pastries (try the kugelhopf or the almond croussant)
column4: to the amazing lunch. Chef Roy is a gift to this city
column5: and Common Bond makes me proud to be a Houstonian!
